text:
I installed Java 1.3.1_05, Apache 1.3.12, Tomcat 3.2.3 in a PC with Linux 
Conectiva 8. When I execute the TOMCAT startup, it starts 40 (forty) process 
java in the machine. Somebody can say me, why ? Is It normal ?
creator: daniela@cpqd.com.br
marconi@vixteam.com.br
text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> I installed Java 1.3.1_05, Apache 1.3.12, Tomcat 3.2.3 in a PC with Linux 
> Conectiva 8. When I execute the TOMCAT startup, it starts 40 (forty) process 
> java in the machine. Somebody can say me, why ? Is It normal ?

May be normal! Tomcat start threads and in Unix, threads are listing like 
process but don´t are.
